B.C. Reg. 68/97
O.C. 248/97
Deposited March 6, 1997
This consolidation is current to March 5, 2024.
Health Authorities Act
Royal Inland Hospital
Amalgamation Regulation
Special resolution defined
1
For the purposes of section 16 (4) (c) of the
Health Authorities Act
, a special resolution for the Royal Inland Hospital, incorporated
under
An Act to Incorporate the Royal Inland Hospital
, is defined as an approval by a majority of the voting members of the
corporation present at a meeting of the membership of the corporation,
called for the purpose of approving the amalgamation.
[Provisions of the
Health Authorities Act
, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 180, relevant to the enactment of this regulation:
sectionÂ 21]
